'''House Cuy''' is a vassal house from [[the Reach]] that holds fealty to [[House Hightower]]. Its seat is [[Sun House]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Cuy is a vassal to House Hightower. Their sigil is six yellow flowers on blue and their seat is located near [[Oldtown]]. In the third and fourth novels, their castle is called "Sun House", but in the fifth book this is changed to "Sunflower Hall". On the TV series maps it remains "Sun House".
sections.Members: * Ser {[[Emmon Cuy]]}, a member of [[Renly Baratheon|Renly I]]'s [[Kingsguard]]. Killed in self-defense by [[Brienne of Tarth]].
